H7637.def: = state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H3442.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H7597.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoiachin<SDBH:יְהֹויָכִין>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H4350.def: = a firm location, suitable for building upon

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H367.def: = state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger, such as aggression from the enemy, a dangerous animal, or death

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2282.def: = celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

H5521.def: = a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4557.def: = an oral or written account of something

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5071.def: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

H5068.def: = causative action by which humans are made willing by their inner person to perform a certain task

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7637.def: = state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H2490.def: = action by which priests disqualify themselves for religious service ◄ by unlawful behavior

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1964.def: = a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political

H3245.def: = causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H2672.def: = action by which humans strike an object repeatedly with an axe, chisel, or other sharp implement, ► in order to alter its shape and so create a new object out of it

H2796.def: = person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal

H3978.def: = any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth

H4960.def: = action by which humans consume water or other liquids

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H730.def: = evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H7558.def: = state in which someone in authority has given permission for something to happen

H3566.def: = man; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}, who allowed the exiles from {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} to return

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H6539.def: = a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of {L:Cyrus<SDBH:כֹּורֶשׁ>} I.

H8145.def: = state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H2490.def: = action by which priests disqualify themselves for religious service ◄ by unlawful behavior

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4605.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H5329.def: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)

H4399.def: = an activity involving a physical effort and usually requiring a certain amount of training or skill

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H6934.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head; returned from {L:Babylonian<SDBH:בָּבֶל>} exile under {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}; supervised those rebuilding the temple; in charge of worship after exile

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H3847.def: = state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H623.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Berechiah<SDBH:בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► temple singer; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H4700.def: = paired round thin metal plate-like objects ► struck together to produce a loud crashing sound as part of musical accompaniment

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H1984.def: = process by which an object emits or reflects light; ≈ regarded as awesome

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H1984.def: = process by which an object emits or reflects light; ≈ regarded as awesome

H3034.def: literally: to confess (God's) name; hence: = action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2617.def: = state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H8643.def: = loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3245.def: = causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7223.def: = state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H3245.def: = causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction

H8643.def: = loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H5234.def: = process by which humans understand the identity or nature of (other) humans, objects or events

H8643.def: = loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
